<h3 id="X38397">X(38397) = EQUICENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND 3rd ANTI-EULER</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b^2+c^2)*a^4-(3*b^4-b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*a^2+2*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38397) = 4*X(5)-3*X(7699) = 8*X(5)-3*X(36852) = X(20)+3*X(18387) = 5*X(631)-3*X(3431) = 7*X(3526)-3*X(11935) = 3*X(7703)-2*X(31857) = 2*X(12062)+X(37484)</b>
<p>X(38397) lies on these lines: {2,575}, {3,9140}, {4,15360}, {5,568}, {20,11454}, {54,3526}, {68,631}, {69,11443}, {76,850}, {110,15069}, {125,7998}, {141,15531}, {182,18882}, {183,30789}, {343,858}, {382,15062}, {511,7703}, {548,12289}, {599,895}, {1154,7579}, {1209,14789}, {1352,10546}, {1656,5643}, {2888,11449}, {3060,5169}, {3410,37760}, {3448,15080}, {3740,32782}, {3832,15741}, {3843,33539}, {4197,5885}, {5067,11487}, {5070,12161}, {5094,8537}, {5181,32248}, {5449,11444}, {5486,21356}, {5876,12824}, {5925,11440}, {6032,13330}, {6792,7746}, {7486,11431}, {7493,11206}, {7539,12834}, {7999,21230}, {8262,11188}, {8548,15059}, {9159,12079}, {10296,18392}, {10516,10545}, {10574,12359}, {11178,16042}, {11412,23330}, {11450,32547}, {11464,23236}, {11550,20063}, {11591,11704}, {11799,15305}, {12062,37484}, {12111,12827}, {12505,32228}, {12828,16868}, {14002,18553}, {14076,32338}, {15067,20396}, {15072,16003}, {15141,32244}, {15717,19467}, {16239,32358}, {18134,37762}, {19127,25335}, {21358,38402}, {22712,31127}, {26913,30739}</p>
<p>
X(38397) = reflection of X(36852) in X(7699)<br>
X(38397) = complement of X(9716)<br>
X(38397) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (343, 23293, 2979), (18553, 32225, 14002)<br>
</p>
